title: Riot won't answer and help at all
body: I  posted my problem and nobody  dosen't answer . They even don't put effort to answer us.. I just wanted to know how to fix my problem because its Christmas and  im taking a  break from everythingh so yea.. my LoL launcher won't open  but it says its running . And yea I hope atleast somebody is gona try to answer me and give me tip how to fix it if Riot obviously won't and ty!

replies.body: Rioters are _trying their hardest_. You should know that there are _tons_ of players who need help like you and they can only help people so fast. Additionally, you can try sending a support ticket.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=h1AM8PaP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-26T19:21:06.803+0000)
>
> Rioters are _trying their hardest_. You should know that there are _tons_ of players who need help like you and they can only help people so fast. Additionally, you can try sending a support ticket.

I did send a support ticket and im sorry I didn't mean to be like that stupid :P I  know they are doing their best , but im just mad I can't open LoL  yea and that is not their fault
I took a look at your ticket and it seems you've already received a reply from a tech specialist. I strongly recommend continuing to work with our tech specialists in order to resolve this. ^.^

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=h1AM8PaP,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-27T02:59:06.733+0000)
>
> I took a look at your ticket and it seems you've already received a reply from a tech specialist. I strongly recommend continuing to work with our tech specialists in order to resolve this. ^.^

Thank you so much for your replay and now I gona try to fix it and work with tech specialist!
